properties.areaDesc: Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued January 2 at 3:46AM EST until January 3 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Upton NY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Southwest winds 10 to 15 kt with gusts up to 20 kt and
seas 4 to 7 feet expected.

* WHERE...Fire Island Inlet NY to Moriches Inlet NY out 20 nm.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 PM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 PM EST FRIDAY
